title: Lost Souls
description: FROM NEW YORK TIMES BESTSELLING & AWARD-WINNING AUTHOR SELENA KITT - OVER TWO MILLION BOOKS SOLD!------------------Eighteen-year-old Lily, raised by her fundamentalist preacher stepfather, Adam, isn’t allowed to date or do anything against church “law.” Asked to the Halloween dance by a boy she really likes, Lily defies Adam. But when they are caught in a compromising position by her stepfather, what will her punishment and repentance be?----- This story was originally published in the anthology Back to the Garden---- This title contains stepfather-stepdaughter incest
author: Selena Kitt
